content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you like the apartment. Let's start with the rental price. What is your offer? Remember, we are only discussing the rental price and not any other costs or conditions.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. Based on the location and the quality of the apartment, I would like to propose a price of 700 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's a low price, Yi-Nuo Wang. I am looking for a higher price. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. I suggest you reconsider your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective, Mister Schmidt. However, I am a student and I am looking for a place that fits within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at 750 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Yi-Nuo Wang, but 750 Euro per month is still too low for this apartment. I am looking for a higher price to cover the cost of the location and the quality of the apartment. Please consider a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Mister Schmidt. However, I must stick to my budget. If you are unable to meet me at 750 Euro per month, I will have to reconsider my options.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your position, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, I am not willing to accept 750 Euro per month. I am looking for a higher price to cover the cost of the location and the quality of the apartment. I hope you can reconsider your budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Mister Schmidt, but my budget is fixed. If you cannot accommodate 750 Euro per month, I will have to look for other options. I appreciate your time, and I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand, Yi-Nuo Wang. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are offering is too low for this apartment. Good luck in your search for an apartment. I hope you find one that meets your needs and budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your time and understanding. Goodbye.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Goodbye, Yi-Nuo Wang. I wish you the best of luck in your apartment search.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
